Title: Relates to sanctions with regard to to substantiated reports of abuse or neglect which are no longer subject to amendment or appeal
Summary: Relates to sanctions by the office of the Medicaid inspector general with regard to substantiated reports of abuse or neglect which are no longer subject to amendment or appeal.
LawCode: Amd ยง493, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to sanctions with regard to substantiated reports of abuse or neglect which are no longer subject to amendment or appeal
